segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink area, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets are ajar, revealing the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is positioned on a small stool beneath it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is extended, fingers inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears tilted, legs not quite steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Beside him, a girl stands with an open palm upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, wetting the floor in a growing pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult remains focused away from the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter to one side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a tidy garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in the daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a moment of quiet domesticity amid hidden troubles.
segments.speaker: PAR
